name: El Paraiso de las Nubes
description:
3D photogrametric scan of the artist, Nayla Manganiello, part of the performance "Cloud's Paradise". Edited in TouchDesigner by Camilo Ortiz (@milocabeza). 

This piece reflects on the narcissistic obsession we all suffer from in this historical moment. The idea is to inscribe this act and this social tendency in a classical sculpture, making us see eachother from the outside instead of being the subject that performs it.
